          Deprecated. Constructs and returns a new matrix with width columns and height rows which is a copy of the contents of the given box.

          Deprecated. Clears all of the bits in receiver whose corresponding bit is set in the other bit matrix.

          Deprecated. Sanity check for operations requiring matrices with the same number of columns and rows.
